description:
While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends get lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Tatsu`s Altaria`s Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from.
Grandma Wilma introduces herself to the group. Grandma Wilma is based off the Route 210 Dragon type Pokémon tutor who teaches Draco Meteor to trainers Pokémon.
When a wild Fukamaru appears and latches its jaws onto Satoshi`s head, Grandma Wilma was able to calm it down by massaging it in specific locations.
name: Tatsu Baasan
